sqlQuery.name: 1. NoFP
sqlQuery.sqlText: select iv.whse_code as Warehouse, iv.sku as Item, pm.sku_desc as Description, sum(iv.qty) as 'Quantity (BTL)' from iv_f iv, pm_f pm where iv.whse_code = pm.whse_code and iv.sku = pm.sku and iv.hold = '' -- exclude NSWP items and not ( pm.custom_char_2 like 'X%BO' -- To be confirmed what to exclude for special order items OR ( pm.custom_char_7 like '%|1098 %' and (pm.sku_desc like 'SO %' or pm.sku_desc like 'OP %' )) ) --and pm.custom_char_2 != 'C' --and pm.custom_char_2 not like 'S%' and iv.sku not in ( select lc.sku from lc_f lc where lc.loc_type = 'FP' and iv.whse_code = lc.whse_code ) and not exists (select iv.loc from iv_f iv1 join lc_f lc on iv1.whse_code = lc.whse_code and iv1.loc = lc.loc where iv1.sku = pm.sku and lc.whse_section = 'S-NSWP') group by iv.whse_code, iv.sku, pm.sku_desc order by iv.whse_code, iv.sku

sqlQuery.name: 2. FP Wrong Empty Flag1
sqlQuery.sqlText: select lc.whse_code as Warehouse, lc.loc as Location, lc.sku as Item, iv.qty as 'Quantity (BTL)' from iv_f iv, lc_f lc where iv.whse_code = lc.whse_code and iv.loc = lc.loc and iv.qty > 0 and lc.loc_type = 'FP' and lc.empty = 'Y' order by lc.whse_code, lc.loc

sqlQuery.name: 3. FP Expired Product
sqlQuery.sqlText: select lc.whse_code as Warehouse, lc.loc as Location, iv.sku as Item, pm.sku_desc as Description, CAST(iv.product_exp_date as DATE) as 'Expiry Date' from iv_f iv, lc_f lc, pm_f pm where iv.whse_code = lc.whse_code and iv.loc = lc.loc and iv.whse_code = pm.whse_code and iv.sku = pm.sku -- comment the next line if look into all locations and lc.loc_type = 'FP' and iv.product_exp_date - pm.exp_lead_time < CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) group by lc.whse_code, lc.loc, lc.loc_type, iv.sku, pm.sku_desc, iv.product_exp_date order by lc.whse_code, lc.loc, iv.product_exp_date

sqlQuery.name: 4. Item TiHi Exceed FP
sqlQuery.sqlText: select pm.whse_code as Warehouse, pm.sku as Item, pm.sku_desc as Description, pm.custom_numeric_1 as Ti, pm.custom_numeric_2 as Hi, lc.loc as Location, lc.max_fp_cap as 'Max Capacity', lc.repl_uom as UOM from pm_f pm, lc_f lc where pm.whse_code = lc.whse_code and pm.sku = lc.sku and lc.loc_type = 'FP' and lc.area not in (SELECT DISTINCT wsp.custom_char_01 FROM wms_system_properties_ldb AS wsp WHERE wsp.property_name = 'BOTTLE_PICK_AREA' AND wsp.whse_code = lc.whse_code) and lc.repl_uom like 'CASE%' and pm.custom_numeric_1 * pm.custom_numeric_2 > lc.max_fp_cap and lc.sku != 'OPEN' order by pm.whse_code, pm.sku

sqlQuery.name: 5. Item > Max Weight
sqlQuery.sqlText: select pm.whse_code as Warehouse, pm.sku as Item, pm.sku_desc as Description, lc.loc as Location from pm_f pm, lc_f lc where pm.whse_code = lc.whse_code and pm.sku = lc.sku and lc.loc_type = 'FP' and lc.area not in (SELECT DISTINCT wsp.custom_char_01 FROM wms_system_properties_ldb AS wsp WHERE wsp.property_name = 'BOTTLE_PICK_AREA' AND wsp.whse_code = lc.whse_code) and (( pm.uom2 = 'PALLET' and pm.wgt2 > lc.wgt ) OR ( pm.uom3 = 'PALLET' and pm.wgt3 > lc.wgt ) ) order by pm.whse_code, pm.sku

sqlQuery.name: 6. Item No Search
sqlQuery.sqlText: select pm.whse_code as Warehouse, pm.sku as Item, pm.sku_desc as Description, lc.loc as Location from pm_f pm, lc_f lc where pm.whse_code = lc.whse_code and pm.sku = lc.sku and lc.loc_type = 'FP' and lc.whse_section not in ( select distinct ws.whse_section from ws_f ws where ws.whse_code = lc.whse_code ) group by pm.whse_code, pm.sku, pm.sku_desc, lc.loc order by pm.whse_code, pm.sku

sqlQuery.name: Warehouses
sqlQuery.sqlText: select whse_code as Warehouse from so_f

dataSource.staticValue: LDB Inventory Audit Report 1 - Items without Forward Pick Location
LDB Inventory Audit Report 2 - Forward Pick Location with Inventory but Marked Empty
LDB Inventory Audit Report 3 - Pick Location with Expired Product
LDB Inventory Audit Report 4 - Items TiHi Exceed Forward Pick Max Capacity
LDB Inventory Audit Report 5 - Item with Larger Weight Than Forward Pick
LDB Inventory Audit Report 6 - Items Not In Search Path
